Package simu.model

Class PizzaServicePoint

java.lang.Object
simu.model.ServicePoint
simu.model.PizzaServicePoint
public class PizzaServicePoint extends ServicePoint
The PizzaServicePoint class represents a service point where pizzas are processed, including being placed in the oven and taken out after preparation. It handles the queue of pizza orders and tracks the availability of oven slots.
